gauthiya muniwarayage birida diwyanganawak men rumath wiya.ranwan patin babalunu ayage piripun shariraya desa balasitima pawa manaskanthaya.dinak gauthiya muniwaraya swakiya sruddhi balayen ayawa thawthisa dewlowata genagiye ehi siri asiriya penwimataya.muniwarayage biridage ru sapuwa dutu dewiwarun ha diwyanganawan pudumayata pathwiya.sadew lowata adhipathi shakra dewandrayada age rupaya daka wikshiptha wiya.diwya rajata aya dutu wita pahath aashawak athi wiya.manussa lowa asaranayange wipathakadi padupul asuna rathwi diwya neth hela owunta pihita wana uthum sak dew rajutada gauthiya muniwarayage rumath birinda daka anuragaye sap dala waduni.age sirure pahasa labime imahath aashawen sak dewige sitha pida wiya.
